```{r}
#| label: setup
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
set.seed(1234)
```

```{r}

#| label: read-messy-data

pre_post_data <- read_excel("/Users/mac/Desktop/PRE_POST_COMPARISON.xlsx")

glimpse(pre_post_data)
```

```{r}

#| label: round-numeric-values

# Round numeric values
pre_post_data <- pre_post_data %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ round(., 2)))
```

```{r}
#| label: tidy the dataset
pre_post_data <- pre_post_data %>%
  select(ParticipantID, starts_with("Pre"), starts_with("Post")) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = -ParticipantID, 
               names_to = c("Time", "Measure"), 
               names_pattern = "(Pre|Post)(.*)") %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = "Measure", values_from = "value")
```
